name: Coin Hero (eewann)
description:
Collect as many coins as you can in 20 seconds.

Desktop control
  1. WASD for movement.
  2. LeftShift for dash.
  3. Mouse for camera.
  4. Escape to exit fullscreen.
  5. "R" to play again.
Mobile control
  1. Use the controller on the screen.
  2. "Back" to exit fullscreen/ar mode.
Special items Coins

items that need to be collected.

Slime

You will be thrown backward when you hit it.

Spiky slime

You will be paralyzed when hit.

Star

Your speed will increase for a few seconds.

Hourglass

Within seconds after picking it up, nearby coins will gravitate toward you.
